TimeSpan.title: TimeSpan
TimeSpan.description: Time span of fixed deposit, usually a range defined by from and to property. Both from and to fields are number. The unit is years. So if it is 3 months, the number would be 0.25

from.title: from
from.description: The number of years the fixed deposit duration starts.

to.title: to
